text: uuth eeka hariyata danne na.....
mita pera mewani gatalu pawathi widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya pasugiya kalaye agamathiwarayage adhikshanaya yatathe pawathimen thibu gatalu rashiyak nirakaranaya kara ganimata haki wi thibe.

aranayaka mawanalla janathawata nomilaye as kannadi labadima ranjith siyambaalapitiya mithrathwa padanama wisin ussapitiya riwisinda widyalayiya aruna shri ranga shalawe di pasugiyada sidu karana ladiema pradeshaye wishala pirisakata me as kannadi laba dima sidukala athara ehidi raswa siti pirisa amathamin widuli sandesha thorathuru thakshana katayuthu pilibanda amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahatha mese kiweya.dayata kirula wadasatahana osse as penima durwala janathawata as kannadi laba denawa.

malesiyanu rajaya wisin wishala mudal pa්ramanayak waya kota mudrana shilpaya igena ganna pasal hara giya saha danata malesiyawe mudrana aayathanawala sewaya karana sewaka sewikawan ge danuma wardhanaya kirima pinisa udaw kirimata mema mudrana aayathanayama kadima nidasunaki.mese mudal waya kirimen erata rajaya balaporoththu wanne ema aayathanaye mudrana shilpaya igenuma labana sisun wenath yuropiya ratawalata gos sewaya kirimen eratata widesha winimaya ipayime thawath margayak sandaha idakada salasa dimak waniya.
arun thun denage as dan dan eliyata panala mese dige rol weyi kiyala api balagena idiya....

aya ruwanthi mangalaya.thawath ayek siti.ee namalta hruda spandanaya laba dun krishanthaya.thama kariya kerena thuru ahinsaka minisun rawatima minisun athara sitina madhyama panthika ekthara kotasakage sirithaki.namal da thalathuoya sita kolambaata sankramanaya wi wiraha githa (ekala ema githa wakya rachana lesa da hadinwiya.)gayana kara tharunayange sihina kumara bawata path wuwaku misa shasthriya gnyanayen ho danumen muhukura giya ayeku nowiya.thaman kawurunda yanna wataha ganime shakthiyakin hebi diyunu manasak nothibu mema gayakaya rallata gos rallenma bimata pathitha wuye akmawa da winasha kara ganiminya.ohuge nohibinakam nisa athi kara gath rogi thathwayata awasanaye rasikayin gen sigaman yadimata ohuta sidu wiya.rupiyal satha wenuwenma satan kara manussakama amathaka kara kumara lilawen wajambaunu namal pilibadawa edath adath danno danithi.
